meanings.sent1: She carefully destains the white shirt before the party.
meanings.sent2: I always use this detergent to destain my clothes effectively.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion destains the fabric instantly, leaving it pristine.
meanings.sent4: Her smile destains the gloomy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The powerful cleaner destains even the toughest stains effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To make (something) clean or spotless by removing stains
meanings.sent1: After hours of scrubbing, she finally destains the carpet.
meanings.sent2: The new product promises to destain carpets without much effort.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claims he can destain anything except his cooking.
meanings.sent4: Her determination destains any doubts about her abilities.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's cape always looks destained, no matter the battle.
